column4: Room was small, no airco and way too expensive for the quality. Even though we booked for 3 persons their was only 2 sets of towels.

column3: The bed was super comfortable and the hotel was in a fab location!!
column4: The walls were paper thin so was noisy from the room next to me but nothing too bad

column3:
The reception was super nice
It's right in the city center and we had great views

column4: no idea where to park Although kettle supplied no wall sockets worked. no charging of phones laptop was possible appeared to be mid update.  The bed was comfortable to sleep but as only one chair bed was too soft to sit on. we had to stay 2 nights as we had app with a vet for dog

column3: Nice clean place easy location and reasonable rates. Great for family on a budget or couple on 2-3 days stop over
column4: I luv the hotel but the booking.com website is not very clear so I advise people look on site then contact hotel direct.

column3: Friendly welcome and room size. Perfect location.
